title: I Forge Digital Future!
description:
Hi, I'm Murali Krishna, a UX/UI Designer with over 2.7 years of experience crafting user-friendly and impactful digital products. I specialize in blending UX and UI principles to create solutions that meet user needs and drive business goals. My experience spans industries including EduTech, Health, EMS, FMS, e-commerce, and SaaS applications — across web, mobile, and tablet platforms.
I’ve worked closely with cross-functional teams, consistently contributing to innovative and effective design outcomes.
Previously at Qentelli Solutions, I honed my skills in delivering intuitive user experiences. Currently, I’m a UX/UI Designer at Invest4Edu, where I lead design initiatives and provide strategic guidance to my team.
subtitle: MY PROFESSIONAL PROFILE
